name: fslchfiletype
author: Oxford Centre for Functional MRI of the Brain (FMRIB)
description: Tool to change the file type of an image file or copy it to a new file.

inputs.description: The type of the file to convert to. Valid values include: ANALYZE, ANALYZE_GZ, NIFTI, NIFTI_GZ, NIFTI_PAIR, NIFTI_PAIR_GZ, NIFTI2, NIFTI2_GZ, NIFTI2_PAIR, NIFTI2_PAIR_GZ.
inputs.name: File type

inputs.description: The name of the input image file.
inputs.name: Input file

inputs.description: The name of the output image file (optional).
inputs.name: Output file

output-files.description: Output file with the new file type.
output-files.name: Output file
